Third Party Add-on Activation Wizard

Requires: Base Development System

Select Help»Activate Add-ons to display this wizard. Use this wizard to activate or deactivate third-party LabVIEW add-ons.

This wizard displays various pages and components depending on whether you activate one or multiple add-ons automatically, activate one add-on manually, or deactivate an add-on.

Possible Activation and Deactivation Methods

Refer to the following topics to learn about the pages and components this wizard displays during each method of activation or deactivation.

Automatically Activating One Third-Party Add-on

Automatically Activating Multiple Third-Party Add-ons

Manually Activating One Third-Party Add-on through a Web Browser

Manually Activating One Third-Party Add-on through the Telephone

Automatically Deactivating Third-Party Add-ons

Manually Deactivating Third-Party Add-ons
